project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of a 30 MW hydroelectric station at Nayon on the San Pedro River and an 18 MW diesel electric plant near the capital city of Quito; improvement and expansion of the transmission and distribution system for Quito; and a village electrification program. Also, consultant services for management, administration and tariff matters of EEQ; a study of the company's future power generation, and a study of the social costs and benefits of vilage electrification.
